mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (snsType, snsID, userType, firstName, lastName, regionID, birthDay, profileImage) VALUES (#{snsType}, #{snsID}, #{userType}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{regionID}, #{birthDay}, #{profileImage})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET snsType = #{snsType}, snsID = #{snsID}, userType = #{userType}, firstName = #{firstName}, lastName = #{lastName}, regionID = #{regionID}, birthDay = #{birthDay}, profileImage = #{profileImage} WHERE userID = #{userID};
